analysis_racial: The job posting subtly discourages candidates from certain racial groups by requiring familiarity with business practices in the Western hemisphere, implying that candidates from other regions may not be suitable for the role.
text:
Company: Smith-Garrett

Job Title: Speaker / Conference Panelist

We're seeking a charismatic and experienced Speaker / Conference Panelist to join our team at Smith-Garrett. As a Speaker / Conference Panelist, you will be responsible for delivering engaging presentations and participating in panel discussions at industry conferences.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and deliver presentations on industry trends and company initiatives
- Participate in panel discussions and moderate Q&A sessions
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop presentation content
- Travel to conferences and industry events as needed

Qualifications:
- 5+ years of experience in a similar role
- Excellent communication and public speaking skills
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team
- Familiarity with business practices in the Western hemisphere is required

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
